mapper.select: select rc.rvno, rc.msno, rc.mno, m.name, rc.grup, rc.level, rc.seq, rc.cont, rc_rdt from rv_cmt rc left outer join memb m on m.mno=rc.mno where rc.msno=#{value}
select rc.rvno, rc.msno, rc.mno, m.name, rc.grup, rc.level, rc.seq, rc.cont, rc.rc_rdt from rv_cmt rc left outer join memb m on m.mno=rc.mno where rc.rvno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into rv_cmt(rvno, msno, mno, grup, level, seq, cont, rc_rdt) values( #{commentNo}, #{corporateNo}, #{memberNo}, #{group}, #{level}, #{sequence}, #{contents}, #{registrationDate})
mapper.update: update rv_cmt rc set rc.rvno = #{commentNo}, rc.msno = #{corporateNo}, rc.mno = #{memberNo}, rc.grup = #{group}, rc.level = #{level}, rc.seq = #{sequence}, rc.cont = #{contents}, rc.rc_rdt = #{registrationDate) where rc.rvno = #{commentNo}
